mapper.select: select count(0) from t_law_related where case_type = #{caseType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND YEAR(insert_time) = #{year, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND MONTH(insert_time) = #{month, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT case_type label, COUNT(0)/(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_law_related)*100 val FROM t_law_related GROUP BY case_type
